attributes.action: Act to intervene to put John Sargeant back in the Strictly Come Dancing competition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned want the PM to act now to persuade John Sargeant to come back into the BBC Strictly Come Dancing competition. Without John in the competition, the light again has gone out of the BBC's light entertainment department and once again the common, foul mouthed oligarchy rule..

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
